description: This file defines an interface IGuide within the WPEFramework::Exchange namespace. The interface provides methods for access to guide-related functionalities such as retrieving channel and program information, managing parental controls, and registering notifications. It also defines a nested interface INotification for event notifications related to EIT broadcast, emergency alerts, and parental control changes.

classes.name: IGuide
classes.description: Interface for guide-related functionalities, including channel and program access, parental control management, and notification registration.

classes.name: IGuide::INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for guide events such as EIT broadcast, emergency alerts, and parental control status changes.

methods.name: StartParser
methods.description: Starts the guide parser with the given shell.

methods.name: GetChannels
methods.description: Returns a string representing available channels.

methods.name: GetPrograms
methods.description: Returns a string representing available programs.

methods.name: GetCurrentProgram
methods.description: Returns the current program details for a specified channel.

methods.name: GetAudioLanguages
methods.description: Returns available audio languages for a given program.

methods.name: GetSubtitleLanguages
methods.description: Returns available subtitle languages for a given program.

methods.name: IsParentalControlled
methods.description: Checks if parental control is active.

methods.name: SetParentalLock
methods.description: Locks or unlocks parental control for a specific entity.

methods.name: IsParentalLocked
methods.description: Checks if a specific entity is parental locked.

ctags.name: IGuide
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IGuide : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
